results.title: Effect of amlodipine on echocardiographic variables in cats with systemic hypertension.
results.text_hl: @<m>DISEASE_Cardiomyopathy_Hypertrophic_Familial</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D024741 @@@Ventricular hypertrophy@@@ is common in @DISEASE_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D006973 @@@hypertensive@@@ @SPECIES_9685 @@@cats@@@ and may resolve after the initiation of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@.

results.title: Effects of amlodipine once or twice daily on circadian blood pressure profile, myocardial hypertrophy, and beta-adrenergic signaling in transgenic hypertensive TGR(mREN2)27 rats.
results.text_hl: For long-term treatment, TGRs were divided into three groups: untreated; @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, once-daily, 5 mg/kg; and @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@, twice daily, 2.5 mg/kg.

citations.NLM: Witte K, Schnecko A, Voll C, Schmidt T, Lemmer B. results.title: Amlodipine decreases fibrosis and cardiac hypertrophy in spontaneously hypertensive rats: persistent effects after withdrawal.
results.text_hl: We investigated the effects of treatment with 2, 8 and 20 mg/kg/day of @<m>CHEMICAL_Amlodipine</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017311 @@@amlodipine@@@ given orally for six months and at three months after drug withdrawal.
